body_html:
The OOM message is about trying to allocate 4294967296 (MAXINT) bytes, which is failing.

This points to a bug where something tries to allocate ((unsigned int) -1) bytes, which sounds like a bug (and a bug in the error message to go with it).

This is, btw., also about host memory. Does this work if you disable the GPU? It might well not be a GPU problem at all.

body:
The OOM message is about trying to allocate 4294967296 (MAXINT) bytes, which is failing. 

This points to a bug where something tries to allocate ((unsigned int) -1) bytes, which sounds like a bug (and a bug in the error message to go with it).

This is, btw., also about host memory. Does this work if you disable the GPU? It might well not be a GPU problem at all.
